metadata.name: Mirage City #1
metadata.description: In Mirage City, a group of agents known as P4R4D0X work tirelessly to protect the city from threats by 5H4D0W. Both factions are trained in the art of digital espionage and combat, these shadow agents use their unique abilities and high-tech gadgets to accomplish their missions to run Mirage City. As the city is plunged into chaos, agent#0000 and the P4R4D0X Agents must use all their training to outmaneuver 5H4D0W and their agents. As the battle between the two factions rages on, both sides call upon the citizens of Mirage City to join their ranks and help fight against the opposing faction Choose your faction, are you P4R4D0X or 5H4D0W?
